english.segment1: Your bet is lost. You're fading slow. Sundown, the dark has laid you low
english.segment2: A rite to save your own. A rite to save your soul. A rite to save your own. The blackness fiend will take you on
english.segment4: Your slipping heart. A gray shadow. Sundown, the dark has laid you low
english.segment5: A rite to save your own. A rite to save your soul. A rite to save your own. The blackness fiend will take you on
